A class to represent a binary search tree.

      Starter method add. pre: The object to insert must implement the Comparable interface.
      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • delete

      public E delete​(E target)
      Starter method delete. post: The object is not in the tree.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface SearchTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
      Parameters:
      target - The object to be deleted
      Returns:
      The object deleted from the tree or null if the object was not in the tree
      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassCastException - if target does not implement Comparable

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(E target)
      Removes target from tree.
      Specified by:
      remove in interface SearchTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
      Parameters:
      target - Item to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the object was in the tree, false otherwise post target is not in the tree
      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassCastException - if target is not Comparable

      Parameters:
